scenario.send:
NOTIFY sip:127.0.0.1:5070 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP 127.0.0.1:5070;branch=[branch] From: sip:127.0.0.1:5060;tag=TAG To: sip:127.0.0.1:5070 Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 4 NOTIFY Contact: sip:sipp@127.0.0.1:5060 Max-Forwards: 70 Event: telephone-event Content-Type: audio/telephone-event Content-Length: [len]
